Package com.stefanbrenner.droplet.ui

This package contains the droplet user interface components.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AboutDialog A dialog that displays information about droplet.
AbstractDropletDialog Base class for all droplet dialogs.
ActionDevicePanel<T extends IActionDevice> Panel for action devices.
ActionPanel<T extends IAction> Panel for action devices.
AddDeviceDialog Dialog that displays controls to add new devices to droplet.
CommunicationPanel Panel that displays controls to connect to a microcontroller.
ControlDevicesDialog Simple dialog to send HIGH and LOW commands to devices and set device numbers.
DeviceSetupPanel Panel to setup one droplet device.
DropletMainFrame Mainframe of the droplet application.
DropletMenu Droplet menu.
DropletToolbar Droplet toolbar containing the most useful actions.
LoggingPanel Panel that shows logging messages.
Messages  
PreferencesDialog Dialog that shows droplet preferences.
ProcessingPanel Panel for setting metadata information for the pictures created with droplet.
 

Package com.stefanbrenner.droplet.ui Description

This package contains the droplet user interface components.
